tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Pulse Rate
programme.desc: Harm and Mac go aboard the USS Gillcrist to determine if a seaman’s fatal accident during a routine repair was the result of a co-worker’s dereliction of duty or worse.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Good Intentions
programme.desc: Mac defends a petty officer and former alcoholic accused of a brutal murder after a drinking binge which renders him useless in remembering details that could help him. Roberts is entangled in the case of a Navy Commander accused of embezzling funds.(n)

programme.title: JAG: People vs SECNAV
programme.desc: After an incident in Iraq claims the lives of innocent civilians, SecNav is brought up on charges of war crimes in International Court, and Harm and Mac must defend him. Meanwhile, during a trip to the arcade, little A.J. goes missing.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Coming Home
programme.desc: A marine’s killing in Iraq has ramifications for JAG stateside as Harm helps the soldier’s family with a media onslaught, and Bud and Mac investigate the failure of his flack vest.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Fighting Words
programme.desc: A general’s comments about Islam during a church service pit Harm and Mac against each other as a court-martial hearing examines whether those remarks were a danger to national security.(n)

programme.title: JAG: One Big Boat
programme.desc: When a Naval Academy sailing team gets caught in a squall and a team member drowns, Mac and Turner must determine if their driven commander willingly put his crew at risk.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Satellite Of Love
programme.desc: The new Director of Homeland Security reunites the team when a nuclear powered Russian satellite is knocked out of orbit and must be diverted before it detonates over Southern California.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Cuba Libre
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Cuba when a woman from Cabe's past pleads for him to help catch a Serbian war criminal.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Fish Filet
programme.desc: In order to save the lives of three judges, Sylvester goes undercover in federal prison but Team Scorpion must break him out when his life is threatened. Kevin Weisman guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Robots
programme.desc: Walter, Cabe, and Happy are trapped with the crew in a top-secret submarine when an explosion sends it to the bottom of the ocean with limited oxygen.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Super Fun Guys
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover on the "Super Fun Guy" movie set in Kazakstan in order to disable a Soviet-era nuclear missile being sold by terrorists.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Tech, Drugs, and Rock 'n Roll
programme.desc: Walter's attempt to "normalize" goes horribly wrong when a nefarious virus is uploaded to his computer.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Bad Moon
programme.desc: As a full moon hangs over the city, the rookies are unnerved by a series of strange occurrences. While investigating the theft of three severed heads, Andy and Swarek pick up the trail of a mentally unstable man who has stopped taking his medication.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart & Sparks
programme.desc: As 15 Division recovers from the shooting of Det. Luke Callaghan, a series of arsons culminates in the torching of a laundromat – and the rookies are forced to confront their own burning issues.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Stung
programme.desc: Using a local car dealership, 15 Division runs a sting operation to crack down on suspects with outstanding warrants. One of the criminals they capture tries to bargain for a lighter sentence.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: In Plain View
programme.desc: When a police informant is found murdered, 15 Division sets its sights on finding a weak link in the notoriously brutal East Jameson gang. Andy has to work closely with Detective Jo Rosati, a woman who seems far too interested in Andy’s fiancé, Luke.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: When a woman gets brutally attacked in the same manner as deceased rookie cop Zoe Martinelli. Det. Luke Callaghan is convinced that it’s the same suspect.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Monster
programme.desc: After a seemingly drunken man collapses in the barn, 15 Division is put under quarantine. Andy and Swarek work together to find the accomplice of a dyed blue bank robber.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The National Emergency Services Gallery
programme.desc: A terrifying place full of history and paranormal activity. The team are tested as the try\nto find the spirits that refuse to leave this famous location.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ye Olde Kings Head
programme.desc: The Great British pub may be on the decline but in some paranormal activity seems to be on the rise and the Ye Olde Kings Head is one of the most haunted.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Annison Funeral Parlour
programme.desc: Coffins, murder and a malevolent spirit plague the team as they investigate this one-time funeral home. With one member isolated alone another in a coffin the team catch a poltergeist in action.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: TOWNELEY HALL Pt2
programme.desc: Watch the second part of Yvette Fielding and the Most Haunted team's investigation of a historic hall, where the paranormal activity includes the disembodied sounds of children laughing and crying and the apparition of a white lady.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: With the team on edge, they explore deeper into the darkness of this incredible place of mystery and secrets. Is the feeling of unease just in their minds or is something about to reveal itself.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Curtain Call
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Joliet, Illinois to investigate the Rialto Square Theater, which is becoming known for being more than just an entertainment venue.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 1
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fortress of Phantoms
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads tothe historic Fort Adams in Newport, Rhode Island. The teams investigate three deadly eventsthat surprisingly weren't from battle!(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 10
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: French Quarter Massacre
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads out to New Orleans, Louisiana to investigate their first case without Grant: The Jimani Lounge Massacre.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Be All My Sins Remembered
programme.desc: A body identification goes awry when it turns out Beka's former crewmate isn't dead at all.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Dance of the Mayflies
programme.desc: Andromeda rescues dying people from a drift, but they soon turn into zombies being controlled by a hive-mind.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: In Heaven Now Are Three
programme.desc: The engine of creation is capable of rewriting the universe according to the owner's wishes. Dylan, Beka and Trance must obtain it before someone with dark plans gets it.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Things We Cannot Change
programme.desc: A black hole knocks out Dylan and sends him into an alternative reality with a wife and child.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Fair Unknown
programme.desc: The crew rescues one of the long-lost founders of the Commonwealth, but discovers she may be more trouble than she is worth.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Belly of the Beast
programme.desc: A mythological space monster tries to eat the Andromeda.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.6
programme.desc: Teen catfight leads to adult feud over truck vandalism/Teen crashes car after drunk 17-year-old allegedly permits him, sued by her father.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.203
programme.desc: A Malibu man claiming he was tired of being a “cabana boy” for his older girlfriend is sued for allegedly stealing her tools and making unauthorized charges on her credit card.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.236
programme.desc: Ex-fiancés from rehab fight publicly and clash in court over an arrest, property return, and a dog. A 19-year-old sues her mother for spending a dog bite settlement check.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.235
programme.desc: A woman sues her sister's ex for repossessing a Chevy Yukon; he alleges stolen tags. Exes argue over a bite mark and sue for car damages, a lease, and unpaid vet bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.82
programme.desc: Two sisters sue a family member for allegedly selling their third\t\t\t\r\nsister’s belongings at a garage sale while she was incarcerated/An allegedly unpaid loan for breast augmentation further divides a woman and her estranged daughter-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.211
programme.desc: Convicted of first-degree assault after an altercation at a bar, a man is sued by his ex-girlfriend who bailed him out of jail.\t\t\t\r\nAn alleged assault between former college dorm mates, a cycle of harassment, and a damaged computer are disputed.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.188
programme.desc: A troubled teen is at the center of a dispute between a woman and her son-in-law’s daughter over the cost of two airplane tickets to Pittsburgh.\t\t\t\r\nA woman sues her son-in-law’s granddaughter for money loaned to buy a mobile home.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.246
programme.desc: Racial slurs and violent threats emerge as a woman and her father sue a family member for incomplete home renovations. Meanwhile, friends swap cell phones, but a defective device complicates the arrangement.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.197
programme.desc: Woman sues child's father for PlayStation III balance and harassment. 'Good Samaritan' sues former friend for student loan balance.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.133
programme.desc: Woman sues ex-friend for damaging Pontiac Grand Prix she was selling; ex-friend countersues for car payments. Parents fight over sick child's medication; neighbor testifies helping administer meds.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.49
programme.desc: A teenager is accused of spitting in the face of and taunting another teenager; an angry mother sues after allegedly false charges of assault and battery are filed against her son.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.254
programme.desc: A teenager sues her sister for a loan to pay car insurance and credit card charges. A man demands payment for an Oldsmobile Alero repossessed by his ex-girlfriend. Another teen sues an ex-friend for assault during an argument over missing property.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: This time, the chefs compete in a special lunch service in honour of two charities run by Los Angeles firefighters, Nick surprises everyone when he bumps into an ex-girlfriend, and further tensions emerge during dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: This time, the chefs must prepare a Greek meal each choosing a protein as a basis for their dish. Meanwhile, Josh gives himself a motivational speech after being singled out for his lack of leadership.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Today, the chefs must create a dish using an alcohol - either beer, wine or a spirit. Judging the dishes along with Gordon are a couple of guest bartenders. Meanwhile, a slipped disc threatens Bret's progress.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Today, the chefs are faced with a selection of exotic protein foods and have to try to grab what they want to use for their dish, including alligator, wild boar and ostrich.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Today's challenge is to prepare a homecoming dinner for the Calabasas High School with the theme of Mardi Gras using seafood, chicken and beef.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The team that identifies the most foods in a blind taste test wins a shopping spree. During dinner service, the chefs present a five-course meal for two charitable organisations.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Knife Week
programme.desc: While Froy waits on news from his lawyer about his warrant in Texas, he considers taking matters into his own hands. Lou and Froy bust some slick moves in an attempt to wrangle a car from a debtor who is prepared to battle. Then, when one woman behaves...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Think, Adapt and Attack
programme.desc: Matt and Froy head to Texas to clear Froy's name, but things take a turn for the worse and Froy finds himself in more trouble than he can handle. Back in LA, Lou and Lyndah repo a car from a deceptive charity worker, and Lou is left to protect...(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Missed Connections
programme.desc: Timmy wants to reconnect with a woman he met on the subway; Jeff and Audrey turn on each other when former friends snub them.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Five Things
programme.desc: Jeff can't think of five nice things to say about Audrey; Russell encourages Timmy to serenade a woman; Jennifer and Adam mistakenly get Jeff and Audrey's bank statement.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Meat Wars
programme.desc: Audrey drags Jen to a Bon Jovi concert to prove that she's still young and fun, leaving Jeff and Adam at home. Russell finds a phone number in his pocket and asks Timmy to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Goodbye Dolly
programme.desc: Audrey tries to prepare for motherhood by continuing to repair a doll that she keeps damaging. Meanwhile, Jeff questions whether the very pregnant Brenda should be dating anymore, and Adam tries to convince Jennifer that he is a manly man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Shower
programme.desc: Jen puts the wrong date on the invitations to Audrey's baby shower, Jeff likes Audrey's maternity clothes, and Russell gives up women.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Liz Moves In
programme.desc: Liz temporarily moves in with Jeff and Audrey. Jeff isn't happy with the new guest, but changes his mind when he discovers Liz consistently takes his side against Audrey.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Taking Names
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey realize that the names on their baby list are also the names of women that Russell has slept with. Adam becomes a cycling enthusiast after Jennifer suggests they start riding bikes in the park.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Feeling lonely after her cat dies, Liz looks for a sperm donor. When Timmy's intellect and innocence don't attract his crush, he tries his hand at playing 'big dog.' Adam rips the vintage wedding dress that Jennifer's family sent her.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cupcake
programme.desc: Russell gets jealous when Timmy manages to outshine him at his own pick-up game. Adam and Jennifer leave pot-laced cupcakes on the kitchen counter, and an unaware Jeff eats one.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fountain Of Youth
programme.desc: After meeting up with college friends who are no longer into partying, Jeff and Audrey set out to prove that even with a baby on the way, they can still have fun. Meanwhile, Timmy attempts to find Russell's compassionate side.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Baby Talk
programme.desc: When Audrey bonds with their unborn baby by reading her stories, a paranoid Jeff believes that she is trying to form an alliance against him. Meanwhile, Russell steals an article that Timmy wrote.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Your Lying Eyes
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit on this case takes them into some parts of Ohau, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Crime Don't Pay
programme.desc: Today the crew is hunting for Holly, a car thief. She's one of Tim's bonds and the entire Dog crew knows that means trouble - or at least a long and difficult chase.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Twisted Love
programme.desc: Dog is tracking down Cecilia, who's wanted for car theft, but she's nowhere to be found. Her girlfriend and co-signer has gone missing too. Just when the trail goes cold, a friend leads the team to the cosigner's empty apartment.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Where the Wild Things Are
programme.desc: Dog, Beth and the team are in Colorado and they face a special challenge - getting the kids to camp. After the drop-off, Dog is more than ready to track down a fugitive. Robin disposed of a body after a homicide, and now he's skipped his court date.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Luv Still
programme.desc: Dog is in search of a potentially dangerous fugitive, he's only 19 and charged with kidnapping and menacing. The case takes an unexpected turn when the Chapman clan ends up in a confrontation with the suspect's family.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Day of the Dog
programme.desc: Dog and the team are back in Colorado hunting bounties. Today's fugitive has a long rap sheet and a reputation for packing heat. With nothing but an address and phone number, the team heads out on the hunt.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Time to Cry
programme.desc: Kimo does a vanishing act for his day in court and now Dog and the posse have to find him. With precious few leads to follow Dog turns to the fugitive's on-again-off-again girlfriend, but she's initially reluctant to join the hunt.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Up on the Roof
programme.desc: Today, Dog and the family are back in Colorado and are about to make one of their most exciting captures ever. When the adrenaline-fueled arrest goes down, every family member will play a critical role.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.(n)

programme.title: What We Left Behind: Looking Back At Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
programme.desc: To commemorate 25 years of `Star Trek: Deep Space Nine', an exploration of the film's legacy. Full interviews as well as behind-the-scenes stories with the original team and actors will be presented and revisited.(n)

programme.title: Area Q
programme.desc: After his son disappears a journalist goes to Brazil to investigate, where he discovers close encounter sightings that have taken place in a region known as Area Q, where he may uncover the mystery surrounding his son's disappearance.(n)

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: Beneath the icy surface, survivors of Colony Seven struggle as food supplies dwindle and temperatures drop. Plagued by illness, the colonists suspect the worst when they mysteriously lose contact with Colony Five, the only other known settlement.(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.(n)

programme.title: The Man Without A Face
programme.desc: Chuck wants to leave home but can't make the grade for boarding school. Then, he finds out the disfigured recluse (Mel Gibson, "Braveheart") living nearby is an ex-teacher.(n)

programme.title: A Most Violent Year
programme.desc: In 1981 NYC, an immigrant (Oscar Isaac) and his family try to expand their business as rampant violence and corruption drag them in and threaten to destroy all they have built.(n)

programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Starring Eddie Griffin and Nathan Phillips. With the speedometer maxed out, a group of exotic car fanatics hit the streets in hopes of winning a life-changing sum of 24 million dollars. Every rule is broken as these drivers.(n)

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Set in 1968, a German Shepherd enrolled by his family in a training program that will send him to serve American soldiers in Vietnam. Even when Rain is wounded, he saves many, and bonds with a soldier who learns much from this very special dog.(n)

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: Craig Fairbrass stars as Lex, who has been told that his daughter has died in LA. However, he finds that the body isn't his daughter, and that an internet fraudster has her hostage. Lex wreaks havoc through the streets of LA trying to find her.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Karen
programme.desc: Karen is an entitled middle-aged woman whose demanding nature has alienated her loved ones. After a series of instances displaying her privilege, Karen receives an intervention from some unconventional spirits.(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Christmas
programme.desc: When Ashley’s plans to reconnect with her high school sweetheart over Christmas fails, she and her best friend Liam decide to fake their own romance. But as her feelings start to turn real, Ashley will have to decide what her heart really wants.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Gift
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story. Ten-year-old Wesley puts together a "Secret Santa" gift for a needy child and when ten-year-old Megan opens the package, she discovers an item that will have a huge impact on her life to come.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: We'll Meet Again
programme.desc: Socialite Molly is released from prison after serving a 6-year sentence for the murder of her husband and sets out to prove her innocence with the help of Fran, an investigative reporter who uncovers a conspiracy of silence and a shocking secret.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: Pretend You Don't See Her
programme.desc: As she lay dying, a woman gives the only witness to her murder her daughter's journal, implying that her attacker may also be responsible for her child's death. Before giving the journal to the police, the witness makes a copy for herself.(n)

programme.title: Twin Betrayal
programme.desc: Hoping for a fresh start, Julia, a troubled woman, moves to Los Angeles with her new boyfriend. After settling into a new home, mysterious things begin to happen. It's not long before Julia becomes convinced that her demons have moved with her.(n)

programme.title: How to Be a Latin Lover
programme.desc: Forced to live with his sister after his wife dumps him, a desperate man hatches a scheme to seduce a widowed billionaire and live the high life once again.(n)

programme.title: Boo! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Cranky, fast-talking Madea (Tyler Perry) finds herself under attack from ghosts, ghouls and zombies after breaking up a fraternity's Halloween party.(n)

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali (Will Smith) battles Sonny Liston, Joe Frazier and George Foreman and raises controversy outside the ring.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: One
programme.desc: After his friends Mr. Cousin is wounded and Mr. Brother is killed, Earp goes after the people who did it.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: The Underdog
programme.desc: A local girl wants to marry a painter but her family is against it. The painter was told by Buntline to ask Earp for help.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Two
programme.desc: Earp and Bat leave Dodge City to go after the remaining three members of the Dry Gulcher Gang who killed Mr. Brother.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Doc Holliday Rewrites History
programme.desc: A man arrives in Dodge City professing to write histories of locations. Doc Holliday decides to use him to stir up Dodge City.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Three
programme.desc: Two killers of the Dry Gulcher Gang have been eliminated but two are still at large. Wyatt leaves for Texas and goes on pursuing them, with the support of some local Texas Rangers.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Dig a Grave for Ben Thompson
programme.sub-title: Dig a Grave for Ben Thompson
programme.desc: Ben Thompson sneaks back into Dodge City bringing trouble and two women who were both promised marriage by him.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Four
programme.desc: Now in the heart of Texas, Earp is about to find the last survivor of the Dry Gulcher gang, who killed his Indian friend. But his task happens to be even tougher than expected.(n)

programme.title: Ballad of Death Valley: Ballad of Death Valley
programme.desc: An 'angel-faced' gunfighter is tasked with infiltrating a ranch overrun by Mexican bandits and saving their hostages, including the fiancée of the local sheriff.(n)

programme.title: Antboy
programme.desc: 12-year-old Pelle is bitten by an ant and develops superpowers. Aided by comic book nerd Wilhelm, Pelle creates a secret identity as superhero Antboy.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Inspired by the classic fairy-tale, we follow a young girl who meets an enchanting woman she believes to be the real “Little Mermaid”. Starring: William Moseley, Poppy Drayton, Loreto Peralta.(n)

programme.title: Knucklehead
programme.desc: After incurring a large debt with a local criminal ringleader, Eddie Sullivan creates a get-rich-quick scheme and enlists a gentle giant named Walter as his unwitting accomplice.(n)

programme.title: The Nutcracker
programme.desc: In 1920s Vienna, lonely Mary receives a nutcracker doll from her Uncle Albert. On Christmas Eve, her imagination brings it to life as "NC," leading her on a perilous journey against the Rat King's plot to overthrow humanity.(n)

programme.title: Major Movie Star
programme.desc: When a movie star suddenly finds herself broke and humiliated in the public eye, she witlessly enlists in the U.S. Army hoping in vain that it will change her life. Starring: Jessica Simpson, Vivica A. Fox, Steve Guttenberg.(n)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is just your average, undercover super-assassin. When he meets Jen, he finds true love. But a picture-perfect marriage won't save Spencer from becoming a target himself. Now Spencer and Jen are on the run for their lives.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: Derby Day
programme.desc: Following the hopes, dreams, joys and anxieties of Londoners from different walks of life as they intersect via chance-encounters at Epsom Downs racecourse on the morning of Derby Day.(n)

programme.title: The Divorce of Lady X
programme.desc: A barrister is named co-respondent in his client's divorce suit after lending her the overnight use of his hotel suite.(n)

programme.title: Bachelor of Hearts
programme.desc: A German exchange student has girl troubles while studying at Cambridge, as the annual May Ball approaches.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Hunting with the Enemy
programme.desc: An urn commissioned in a Cambodian monastery by the Chinese emperor for the remains of Confucius is about to be destroyed by systematic bombing of a whole province.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Under the Ice
programme.desc: Despite terrible weather, Sidney drags Nigel along to an Arctic base where an ancient Indian mummy has been found, who turns out to be an Anasazi.(n)

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S4 E7 - John Quixote
programme.desc: Crichton and Chiana get stuck in a video game where they encounter strange/twisted versions of their friends.(n)

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S4 E8 - I Shrink Therefore I Am
programme.sub-title: Farscape: S4 E8 - I Shrink Therefore I Am
programme.desc: When Moya is raided by bounty hunters working for the Peacekeepers, every crew member is captured except for Crichton and Noranti.(n)

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S4 E9 - A Prefect Murder
programme.sub-title: Farscape: S4 E9 - A Prefect Murder
programme.desc: While Moya and her crew are resupplying on a generally xenophobic planet, Aeryn kills the next prefect while under a strange form of suggestion.(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Albert determines that neither Leo nor Jacques killed Laura, but he is unable find any leads into who shot Cooper. Cooper says they must find the third man, who he believes to be Bob, the gray-haired man.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Abduction
programme.desc: A volunteer who was working to interpret an ancient message from Ma'el assaults Da'an and escapes through a portal. Sandoval helps Da'an avoid interrogation from Zo'or while they try to locate her.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Arrival
programme.desc: A Taelon shuttle is shot down over Antarctica. There are Jiridians aboard, but two of the passengers escape. When Augur discovers Lili's blood on the ship, he is convinced that she is not dead.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Forge of Creation
programme.desc: Lili, Vorjak, and the baby flee to find a shuttle to escape Earth. Liam and Sandoval are both tracking them - for different reasons. Augur is on the run from volunteers, but sends a friend (Juliet) to help Liam while he's gone.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: First Breath
programme.desc: A college friend of Renee's resurfaces and leads them on an investigation of the link between the Taelons and a biomedical facility's cloning operation.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Sins of the Father
programme.desc: A Senator's daughter is found to have kryss in her system. Liam and Renee suspect the Taelons lied about synthesizing it and there is a new location for production. They believe Federov is involved. Da'an is addicted to kryss.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Metamorphosis
programme.desc: The team gathers for their scheduled morning meeting with Will uncharacteristically absent. Kate goes to his room to find out where he is and discovers that although he feels normal, he doesn’t look the part.(n)
